price: İçinizden sözü saklayan ile açığa vuran ve geceye bürünerek gizlenip gündüzün ortaya çıkan arasında fark yoktur.
arabic: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri
